trans-unit.source: Iterates over all following nodes according to the XPath following axis rules.
trans-unit.target: Itera em todos os nós seguintes de acordo com as regras de eixo seguinte do XPath.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator> iterates over all following nodes according to XPath following axis rules, merges multiple sets of following nodes in document order, and removes duplicates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator> itera em todos os nós a seguir de acordo com a XPath seguindo as regras de eixo, mescla vários conjuntos de nós a seguir na ordem do documento e remove duplicatas.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter" /> class, which enables you to filter nodes based on name.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter" />, que permite filtrar nós com base no nome.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator> merges multiple sets of following nodes in document order and removes duplicates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator> Mescla vários conjuntos de nós a seguir na ordem do documento e remove duplicatas.
Retorna o navegador de resultados atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current%2A> property changes when the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current%2A> property to the next node and returns <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.HaveCurrentNode>; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current%2A> propriedade é alterado quando o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.MoveNext%2A> método define o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current%2A> propriedade para o próximo nó e retorna <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.HaveCurrentNode>; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current%2A> propriedade permanece inalterada.

trans-unit.source: Moves the iterator to the next following node.
trans-unit.target: Move o iterador para o próximo nó.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="F:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.NoMoreNodes" /> if there are no more following nodes.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see cref="F:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.NoMoreNodes" /> se não houver mais nós em seguida.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="F:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.NeedInputNode" /> if the next input node must be fetched first.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see cref="F:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.NeedInputNode" /> se o próximo nó de entrada precisar ser buscado pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="F:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.HaveCurrentNode" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current" /> property was set to the next node while iterating through the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Retornará <see cref="F:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult.HaveCurrentNode" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current" /> tiver sido definida como o próximo nó durante a iteração nos nós.
